ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Subscription Problems
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Arrgh !!! My anxiety level soars. No Email yet. I tried the phone call route of course. The hoops they put you through gott a be designed to discourage
ygData.messageBody:
> I didn't put my order in until the 10th or 11th. I got my email this week
> on Monday, but haven't received the package yet.
> Raiel
Arrgh !!! My anxiety level soars. No Email yet. I tried the phone call
route of course. The hoops they put you through gott'a be designed to
discourage callers. Zomaz wont start taking calls again until around 3PM
EST and I bet their swamped. (1-800-STATION I believe ) This is stupid.
EVERY online transaction I have ever participated in, EBay and all,
sends you a confirmation of your order. These IDIOTS didn't. What does
that tell you.. sweet deniability ?
